name: Bleeding Vampire
description:
What happens when you are a vampire, but you are too lazy to hunt and just want to enjoy your immortality to take it easy ? Well, like Barnabas, you just risk being at odds with the Lord of all vampires, Dracula himself. And now, you are even more cursed. You lose your health every ten seconds, and you’re thrown into a cursed castle.

And now, you have to kill to restore your health and prove your worth. Or try to sneak and get potions to that. And you have to deal with a friendly(?) goat that gives you some sort of… strange advices.

Well, you’re cursed. Even more cursed, I mean. Good luck with that !

Controls : 

Arrows/ZQSD/WASD : Move

Mouse left click : Attack
